content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61) and (-18, -53)
Two parallel mining setups consisting of:
- Burner mining drills at (-28, -61) and (-18, -53)
- Wooden chests at (-27.5, -59.5) and (-17.5, -51.5) for ore collection
- Burner inserters moving ore to stone furnaces
- Stone furnaces at (-25, -59) and (-15, -51) for smelting
- Output chests containing iron plates at (-22.5, -58.5) and (-12.5, -50.5)

### Coal Mining Setup at (41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41, -82)
- Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing 221 coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Power Generation System
Located around (-4.5, 12.5), includes:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected pipe networks for water and steam distribution
- Electrical network powering multiple entities

### Science Pack Production Line
Located around (8.5, 13.5), includes:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter feeding assembling machine
- Assembling machine 1 at (8.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Lab for research

ERROR TIPS

### Issues with Science Pack Extraction
- Verify that automation science packs are actually being produced and stored in the output chest before attempting extraction
- Check if the assembling machine has all required ingredients (iron gear wheels and copper plates)

### Resource Management Issues
- Monitor coal levels in inventory before attempting to fuel entities
- Ensure proper resource flow between mining, smelting, and assembly operations

### Production Line Issues
- The assembling machine is reporting missing iron gear wheels - ensure consistent supply of materials
- Verify that inserters have fuel and are properly positioned to transfer items between entities

### Fluid System Management
- Multiple pipe groups are empty - ensure proper fluid connections and flow between offshore pump, boiler, and steam engine

### Entity Placement
- Some inserters are waiting for source items - verify proper alignment and positioning of inserters relative to source/destination entities
